member.name: UI_ANIMATION_SCHEDULING_RESULT.UI_ANIMATION_SCHEDULING_UNEXPECTED_FAILURE
member.summary: Scheduling failed for an unexpected reason.

summary.para: Scheduling failed because a scheduling conflict occurred and the currently scheduled storyboard has higher priority.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_SCHEDULING_RESULT.UI_ANIMATION_SCHEDULING_ALREADY_SCHEDULED
member.summary: Scheduling failed because the storyboard is already scheduled.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_SCHEDULING_RESULT.UI_ANIMATION_SCHEDULING_DEFERRED
member.summary: Scheduling is deferred and will be attempted when the current callback completes.
